EXTRACTED VALUE: Even at the reduced $49.99 price point Facebreaker must be avoided unless you like no-brainer button mashing boxing.
Everything about this game smacks of a half-arsed Xbox Live Arcade title that's blundered into the full retail schedule by accident. [Apr 2007, p.93]
So Transformers: The Game is just a complete mess, a game that succeeds in almost nothing that it sets out to do.
